file_content.text: The Creation Nest looks forward to working with the Empire.
This is interesting. We are very interested. What are you doing here? Strangers. Researchers. No, not researchers. All researchers gone. Dead.
I'm a Lord of the Sith. I represent the Empire.
Allow me to introduce myself.
Of course. Few Republic left. Balmorrans not interested in experiments anymore.
I'm the arm of the Empire. Its weapon. The death of its enemies.
Don't get in my way, monster.
Empire. Good. Very good. Hoping to meet with Empire.
I'm an agent of the Empire on a mission to collect the information on these experiments. I advise you against interfering.
Stand aside.
Interfere? No, we do not want to interfere. We want to help.
I don't know about any researchers. I'm just here to find out about the Colicoids.
Back off. I have a job to do.
Very interesting. You do not look like a scientist, but appearances are not always accurate.
I didn't know Colicoids could talk. Who are you?
What are you?
Of course we talk. We think. We invent. We talk.
What happened to the researchers?
How did they die?
Killed. By the things that appear to be us, yet are not.
You are from the Empire. Must be. Few Republic left. Balmorrans not interested in experiments anymore.
We are Cessik of the Creation Nest. We provided the Colicoid DNA for these experiments. They are cousins. More Colicoid and less Colicoid than we are.
My mission is to recover all the records of these experiments.
I need that data.
Excellent. We do not want these experiments to go to waste. Want to see our cousins' full potential.
It must be hard to see your cousins turned into monsters.
I'm sorry.
Yes. First mutated Colicoids do not meet full weapons potential. More experiments, more powerful designs.
I can't believe the Colicoids willingly contributed to these experiments.
You mean the Colicoids helped?
Of course. Self-improvement. Build a better Colicoid. Very successful so far, but so much potential left.
Take data. We offer an arm in friendship to the Empire. Experiments must continue. We cannot wait to meet with your scientists.
We are busy.
